alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeKalb, southwestern Gwinnett and central Fulton Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Sandy Springs to near Lakeview Estates, and moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Mountain Park, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Alpharetta, Dunwoody, East Point, Snellville, Lilburn, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Tucker and Belvedere Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
